app.py:
Page Title: app.py

Module Overview:

  Purpose: This module initializes a Flask application and defines two routes for handling HTTP requests. The "/" route returns a simple "Hello, World!" message, while the "/ping" route returns "pong".

  Dependencies: 
  - Flask: The Flask framework for building web applications.

Functions:

  hello_world() -> str:
  - Purpose: Returns a "Hello, World!" message.
  - Arguments: None
  - Returns: str
  - Exceptions: None

  ping() -> str:
  - Purpose: Returns a "pong" message.
  - Arguments: None
  - Returns: str
  - Exceptions: None
views.py:
Page Title: views.py

Module Overview:

  Purpose: This file serves as the views module for handling user interface logic and rendering templates in the application.

  Dependencies: 
  - Django: The web framework used for building the application.
  - templates: HTML templates for rendering the views.

Classes:

No classes defined in this file.

Functions:

No functions defined in this file.
